About this item
 • 6.5" 720 x 1600 (HD+) PLS TFT LCD Infinity-V Display, 5000mAh Battery, 3.5mm jack
 • 32GB ROM, 2GB RAM, Unisoc SC9863A (28nm), Octa-core, IMG8322 GPU, Android 11 (Go edition)
 • Rear Camera: 8MP, f/2.0, Digital zoom up to 4x, Front Camera: 5MP, f/2.2, Bluetooth 4.2, MicroUSB 2.0
 • 2G GSM: 850/900/1800/1900, 3G: 850/900/1700(AWS)/1900/2100, 4G LTE: B1(2100), B2(1900), B3(1800), B4(AWS), B5(850), B7(2600), B8(900), B12(700), B17(700), B28(700), B38(2600), B40(2300), B41(2500), B66(AWS-3) - Dual SIM
 • International Model - No Warranty in US. Compatible with Most GSM Carriers like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Cricket, Boost

contents.content: Expand your view to the fullest: Expand your view with the Galaxy A03 Core's 6.5-inch Infinity-V Display and discover uncharted details. Thanks to HD+ technology, your everyday content will look better: sharp, sharp and clear. Take amazing photos, front and back: Capture clear and beautiful photos of your favorite moments with the Galaxy A03 Core's 8 MP main camera. You can also turn it around and use the 5 MP front camera to put the focus on you. Storage and speed you can count on: The Galaxy A03 Core combines the power of an octa-core processor with up to 2GB of RAM for fast and efficient performance, plus 32GB of internal storage. Battery to enjoy all day: Enjoy the day with a battery that accompanies your rhythm. The 5,000 mAh (typical use) battery lets you keep going for hours on end.

comments.title: Good phone
comments.comment: Using in the Caribbean island and I can't complain after a month now of using no issues. Hopefully it keeps up but so far I'm loving it. Good value for your money.
